author: Daily Mirror
title: Ground News - 'Sub-zero temperatures won’t make me a snowflake - I lived through winter 1947'
text: 'Sub-zero temperatures won’t make me a snowflake - I lived through winter 1947' As a three-year-old, I lived through the winter of 1947 in an unheated terraced house. In January 1963, I hitch-hiked every night from Nottingham to Wakefield and back to see my new daughter.
